NAME: Europe (EEA)
DESCRIPTION: Predominantly investments in Europe (EEA) region as defined in Guideline ESMA/2014/869EN.

NAME: Europe (other than EEA)
DESCRIPTION: Predominantly investments in Europe (other than EEA) region as defined in Guideline ESMA/2014/869EN.

NAME: North America
DESCRIPTION: Predominantly investments in North America region as defined in Guideline ESMA/2014/869EN.

NAME: South America
DESCRIPTION: Predominantly investments in South America region as defined in Guideline ESMA/2014/869EN.

NAME: Asia / Pacific
DESCRIPTION: Predominantly investments in Asia/Pacific region as defined in Guideline ESMA/2014/869EN.

NAME: Middle East
DESCRIPTION: Predominantly investments in Middle East region as defined in Guideline ESMA/2014/869EN.

NAME: Africa
DESCRIPTION:
Predominantly investments in Africa region as defined in Guideline ESMA/2014/869EN.
            Defined in Guideline ESMA/2014/869EN

NAME: Other
DESCRIPTION:
Predominantly investments in assets issued by supranational entities or
            it does not predominantly invest in any single geographical region
            defined above.
